definition: faucet/water tap/bicycle handle bar/chief (esp. of gang)/boss/decision maker/(market) leader (of companies)/front end of mud-flow/figurehead on prow of dragon boat 龍船|龙船
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
lit. dragon's head, snake's tail (idiom); fig. a strong start but weak finish
lever-style guillotine decorated with a dragon's head at the hinged end, used to behead criminals related to the emperor

sentences.english: Remove the old faucet and scrape any old putty or caulk from the basin.
sentences.chinese: 拆調舊水龍頭，並颳去洗槽舊的膩子或填充物。

sentences.english: And Rinpoche has vowed to turn off the water while brushing his teeth.
sentences.chinese: 仁波切本身則誓言在刷牙時要關閉水龍頭。

sentences.english: She bent her mouth to the tap and drank the tepid water.
sentences.chinese: 她把嘴伸到水龍頭底下去喝那微溫的水。

sentences.english: Hongjia Ferry hydropower station is a tap station of wujiang River step exploitation in Guizhou province.
sentences.chinese: 洪家渡水電站是貴州省烏江梯級開發的一個龍頭電站。

sentences.english: The insult to the adult consulter results in multiplication of the faulty faucets.
sentences.chinese: 對成年諮詢者的侮辱導致有缺陷水龍頭成倍增加。

sentences.english: Exclusive distribution of "HIESTAND Swiss Gourmet Bakery" leader in frozen premium good.
sentences.chinese: 的獨家經銷商，優質冷凍產品的龍頭企業。

sentences.english: Add low flow aerators to all the faucets in your home.
sentences.chinese: 把你家裏的每個水龍頭都裝上加氣儀。

sentences.english: You are left with the holes in your sink and the supply tubes waiting for the new faucet.
sentences.chinese: 您留給在您的水槽和等待新的龍頭的供應管的孔。

sentences.english: If there aren’t any leaks, wash up with your new faucet fixture.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有任何漏水，就可以清洗你的新水龍頭了。

sentences.english: Filtered water is always on tap, making it very convenient to use.
sentences.chinese: 隨時打開龍頭都有過濾水，用起來很方便。

sentences.english: The faucets on my kitchen sink are stuck. I can't turn them off.
sentences.chinese: 我廚房水槽上面的水龍頭給卡住了，我關不上。

sentences.english: Including moon cakes Guang-moon cakes have become the leading annual output value exceeding 100 million yuan.
sentences.chinese: 其中中秋月餅更成爲廣式月餅的龍頭，年產值超億元。

sentences.english: Then draw water from the lowest faucet in the house.
sentences.chinese: 然後從最低的水龍頭中接水就可以了。

sentences.english: When swabbing bibcock, do not use dissolvent of soda acid sex.
sentences.chinese: 擦洗龍頭時，不要用酸鹼性溶劑。

sentences.english: Not only this, you also get the advantage of knowing whether the water is cold or hot.
sentences.chinese: 不僅如此，你還可以通過這款水龍頭知道水的冷熱。

sentences.english: The water falls from the tap drop by drop.
sentences.chinese: 水從水龍頭裏一滴一滴地往下流。

definition: slab/(geology) tectonic plate/(fig.) sector (of the stock market or of industry)/(economic) bloc
tycoon/magnate/big player (including company, country, school etc)/big shot
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
state enterprise/(Tw) abbr. for 國際企業管理|国际企业管理, international business management (as a subject of study)
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
